document_title: Right-sided migraine: Causes, symptoms and prevention
subsection_name: dau-nua-dau-ben-phai.json_4_Subjects at risk of right-sided migraine
subsection_content:
Anyone can get a right-sided migraine. However, the following cases will have a higher risk.
People who are often stressed, stressed, depressed, etc.; People who have an unhealthy diet, drink little water, smoke or drink alcohol, often stay up late, don't get enough sleep, or suffer from insomnia; or people who rarely exercise are also at risk of migraine in general.; People who regularly use drugs or abuse painkillers excessively. Besides, if your family has members who often have migraines, you are also at higher risk.
